rooms.Name: Guard's rest area
rooms.Description:
After an entire day of work the trail warriors relax in this
luxurious room.  There's a large pool with a nice spa at its
side.  The guards can buy themselves a drink at the bar located
to your south.  If a troll warrior wants to practice his skills
he can go into the training room.

rooms.Name: Troll's Bar
rooms.Description:
The troll's bar is always open to serve their tired customer.
There's a bartender here to serve an assortment of drinks.
Everywhere you look, the bar is packed with drunken troll
warriors.  You're not going to find a table around this place --
might as well just leave.

rooms.Name: Volkov's training school
rooms.Description:
The troll warriors test their skills in this room.  They
challenge other trolls to a fight -- sometimes it's friendly and
other times it's not.  There are many varieties of weapons
hanging on wooden racks.  Everywhere you look, you can see trolls
attack one another in violent combat.

rooms.Name: A pier on the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
This port is totally deserted...  No one would be foolish enough
to ship out to the Endless Sea -- for sailors have been known to
"disappear"  once they sail into this vast ocean.  There's a
strange old man here sitting on his passenger raft.  He looks at
you and smiles.  Then he turns his head and said, "Go back, young
traveler, if you value your life."  The old man is trying to warn
you about the dangers in the Endless Sea.  Maybe you should take
him seriously -- turn back.

ExtraDescs.Description:
012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012

                  N                               port
                  |                                |
           W -- --|-- -- E                       __|
                  |                             |  |
                  S                             |  |
                                                |  |
                               Dark  __ __ __ __|  |__ __
                               Castle  |      typhoon    |
                                       |            __ __|
                              Satanish's           |
                              Deathtrap            |
                               |                 Zola's
 Bora Bora's __ __   Lair of   |                 Domain
 uncharted        Fin Fang Foom|                   |
 island                     |  |  Monstro's        |  Devil's
                            |__|__Territory__ __ __|__Island

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
Something's wrong here... Your boat is swaying back and forth.  You look
up to the sky as it darken.  There's a typhoon coming your way.  Turn
back, quickly, before that storm swallows you up!

Exits.Description: Trust me, you don't want to go in there.

rooms.Name: a whirlpool
rooms.Description:
As you entered into this whirlpool, your boat begins to get sucked underwater.
The power of this whirlpool is so strong, not even the mightiest of
warriors can swim out.  Slowly, you begin to feel your arms tire...  You
begin gasping for air!  The force of the whirlpool is overwhelming.  As
you descend deeper into this sea, you wonder to yourself -- why was I so
stupid to fall into this trap?

Sorry, young traveler, your journey ends here... :(

rooms.Name: A very powerful typhoon!
rooms.Description:
The power of this typhoon is INCREDIBLE!  It tosses your boat around like
a salad.  You can feel the wind slamming into your face.  Paddling in 
the waters is beginning to tire you.  You begin to slip into unconsciousness.
Glug...
      Glug...
            Glug...
Sorry, pal, you've drowned and gone to heaven.

rooms.Name: The shores of an uncharted island
rooms.Description:
You've reached the shores of a small island.  There are tropical trees
everywhere you look.  You wonder if there is anyone living on this
island.  As you walk along the shore, you notice a few bones lying on
the ground...  The bones don't look like any animal bones you've seen.
Suddenly, you sense the horror!  Theses are human bones...  You can hear
the sound of drums from a distance...  There must be cannibals on this
island.  This is where you make a life or death decision -- will you
risk your life to go into this jungle because of your foolish curiosity?

rooms.Name: The village of cannibals
rooms.Description:
You must be a fool to have entered into this area.  The tribe of
savages lives here.  As you enter into this village, you notice
all eyes are focused towards you.  You can see these barbarians
begin to drool as though they see you as a fatten cattle.  In the
center of the village, you notice a large black cauldron.  You
can see human heads bobbing from the broth that they are brewing.
These crazy monsters begin advancing towards you...they come 
closer and closer...you see them licking their lips...

rooms.Name: In the tropical jungle
rooms.Description:
Those savages are playing their drums as though they're having a
festival.  It gets louder and louder as you go further and further
into this jungle.  There is a light to the south of where you are
standing.  The noises seem to be coming from there.

rooms.Name: In the tropical jungle
rooms.Description:
There are a lot of animal life in this jungle besides those sadistic
cannibal killers.  You can see large pythons hanging on tree limbs,
waiting to spring on their prey.  There are wild boars which run pass
you as though there was something chasing them.  You can hear the
mosquitoes buzzing at your ears.  You begin to sweat profusely as the
humidity becomes more annoying.

rooms.Name: In the tropical jungle
rooms.Description:
You can hear a very loud roar as you walk through this area.  Something
lives in this part of the jungle...something very big -- too big to be
any animal.  The roar comes from the east of where you're standing.
You are curious to find out where that roar comes from.  The roar of
that creature doesn't sound too friendly...

rooms.Name: In the tropical jungle
rooms.Description:
Though this island looks small from a distance, the jungle seems to be
endless.  Sweat begins dripping from your brow...  You can hear those
blood-thirsty savages closing in on you.  They must know you're on this
island!

rooms.Name: In the tropical jungle
rooms.Description:
The humidity is almost unbearable.  You can feel the mosquitoes biting
at your arms and the rest of your exposed skin.  Your legs are 
beginning to tire because of the many obstacles in the jungle.  You can
turn back now before you faint from this killer heat.  Who knows?  If 
you become unconscious you may end up a meal for the cannibals.

rooms.Name: In the tropical jungle
rooms.Description:
What you saw was incredible!  There's a large T-Rex standing in front
of you.  He's feasting on the flesh of a Triceratop.  He stands a good
four stories tall.  Suddenly,  the meat-eater detects your presence in
his territory.  He begins to growl...then slowly he turns his head
towards you.  Watch Out!  He's about to spring at you!

rooms.Name: a whirlpool
rooms.Description:
The force of the whirlpool takes you with ease as your boat
begins circling into the center.  Ultimately, you and your little
ship will be swallowed up by the sea.  You begin screaming for 
help as you struggle to stay above water...
If you survive this catastrophe, you notice this whirlpool can 
take you deeper underwater.  You can go deeper to explore the
terrains beneath -- that is, if you can hold your breath long enough!

rooms.Name: an underwater passage
rooms.Description:
The whirlpool seems to be pulling you deeper and deeper underwater.  You
are curious to find what lurks beneath the Endless Sea.  There are rumors
of five great beasts living in this vast sea...could one of them be 
living on the ocean floor?

rooms.Name: an underwater passage
rooms.Description:
The force of the whirlpool is becoming stronger it seems.  As you swim
towards the bottom floor, you notice the many strange marine life.
Suddenly, you feel something is watching your every every movement.  
You see large shadows in these murky depths.  These shadows seem to
be closing in on you!

rooms.Name: the sea floor
rooms.Description:
You're on the sea floor.  The first thing you notice is a cave to the
west of where you're standing.  You know something is living in there...
you can see large air bubbles coming out from within the cave.  Would
you be a fool enough to enter that cave -- it looks pretty dark...

rooms.Name: inside the cave
rooms.Description:
It's so dark in here -- even your powerful light-source looks dim.  As
you walk further into this cave, to your surprise, you see a very large
dragon and he looks pretty angry.  You've entered the cave of the
mighty dragon know as Fin Fang Foom.  He's ready to turn your flesh into
cinder -- Watch Out!!!

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
As you row your ship towards this area, you notice your boat begins to
wobble...  Something is in the waters, something very big.  Suddenly,
you see a large shark fin coming towards you at an incredible speed.
You tell yourself, there's no way there can be a shark that huge --
nothing is that huge.  You have only seconds to figure out what to do
before that shark gobbles you up!

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
CRACK!  Something is hitting the ship from below.  CRACK!  Something
powerful is slamming against the ship -- the ship can't take another
blow or else it will sink!  There's something underwater that wants
to take you down...  As you try taking a closer peek to see what's
attacking you...suddenly, four pair of blood-sucking tentacles begin
to wrap you up!  It drags you underwater!  You notice it's a large
octopus -- the largest octopus you've ever seen!  It wants to make a
meal out of you, but first, it'll have to squeeze the life out of
you with its deadly tentacles!

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
As you row you ship into this area, a large wave forces your ship to
overturn.  What could cause the waters to suddenly produce a wave like
that?  You turn your head towards something HUGE coming your way.  It
looks like a gigantic whale.  It's swimming towards you -- that overgrown
fish thinks you were trying to take his territory -- it's closing in 
for the kill!

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You row your ship into a forbidden area of the Endless Sea.  There's
an island to the west -- it looks like an ancient island because of
its natural landscapes.  You wonder if there is anything edible on
that island.  Suddenly you hear a voice coming out of nowhere...

     "Do not attempt to land on to this island, young journeyman.
      For it is I, Bora Bora, who protects it from invaders such 
      as you!"

The voice comes from a very, very LARGE turtle.  He's blocking your
path towards the island and he looks dead serious about what he'd
just said.  Even if you could sneak by this great beast, you will
not be able to pass through the invisible wall that surrounds this
mysterious island.  The only way you can get to the island is
to kill Bora Bora!

rooms.Name: Island of the Dark Castle
rooms.Description:
Where is this place?  You've reached a small island.  There's 
nothing around you but at a distance, you can see shadowy figures
running towards you.  The inhabitants of this strange island don't
look too friendly.  The only escape you have is back to the sea.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: Along a rugged path
rooms.Description:
This path is slowing your movement quite a bit.  The rugged path 
below you is becoming an obstacle.  As you begin walking along
this road you notice that there are others following your path.
Are they hostile?  Maybe you better just move a little faster so
you don't have to find out.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: Entrance to the Dark Castle
rooms.Description:
WOW!  Look at the size of this castle!  It's painted black from
the outside which gives it a dark, eerie feeling.  The castle is
made of large blocks of stone and you can see vines hanging on
the side of the walls.  There's a large door that'll take you
inside this mammoth complex.  However, first you will have to
get pass the guard...and it's not going to be that easy.

rooms.Name: Along a rugged path
rooms.Description:
There's no escape!  They are everywhere.  You have nowhere to run.
No matter where you go, they will follow!  These strange beings
that are following you are carrying long swords and wearing battle
gears.  They are definitely not the friendly type.  The only 
chance you have right now is FIGHT!

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
Somethings wrong here...  Your boat is shaking back and forth.  You look
up to the sky as it darken.  There's a typhoon coming your way.  Turn
back, quickly, before that storm swallows you up!

Exits.Description: Trust me, you don't want to go in there.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
Somethings wrong here...  Your boat is shaking back and forth.  You look
up to the sky as it darken.  There's a typhoon coming your way.  Turn
back, quickly, before that storm swallows you up!

Exits.Description: Trust me, you don't want to go in there.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
Somethings wrong here...  Your boat is shaking back and forth.  You look
up to the sky as it darken.  There's a typhoon coming your way.  Turn
back, quickly, before that storm swallows you up!

Exits.Description: Trust me, you don't want to go in there.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: On the shores of Devil's Island
rooms.Description:
You've landed on the shores of the mysterious Devil's Island!  This
small island is well-known for it's unfriendly inhabitants.  As you
begin exploring this strange island...you sense something is watching
you.  Maybe it's not a good idea to go any further.  To the south
there's a large castle.

rooms.Name: Walking along a very dark and dangerous path...
rooms.Description:
You are totally surrounded by darkness!!!  You can hear footsteps
closer and closer to where you are standing.  You can hear your heart
beat faster as something from the darkness begins advancing towards
you...  There's a large castle to your south -- if you hurry now, you
might escape to there with your life!

rooms.Name: The Castle of the Troll Lord
rooms.Description:
There's definitely something evil living in this centuries-old 
castle.  You can see cobwebs hanging everywhere you look.  There's
dust all over the place.  The floor is covered by dead and rotting
corpses of rodents.  The stench in this castle is almost unbearable. 
There's a staircase that'll take you up to the tower.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
Somethings wrong here...  Your boat is shaking back and forth.  You look
up to the sky as it darken.  There's a typhoon coming your way.  Turn
back, quickly, before that storm swallows you up!

Exits.Description: Trust me, you don't want to go in there.
If you value your life, stay away from there.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
Somethings wrong here...  Your boat is shaking back and forth.  You look
up to the sky as it darken.  There's a typhoon coming your way.  Turn
back, quickly, before that storm swallows you up!

Exits.Description: Trust me, you don't want to go in there.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
Somethings wrong here...  Your boat is shaking back and forth.  You look
up to the sky as it darken.  There's a typhoon coming your way.  Turn
back, quickly, before that storm swallows you up!

Exits.Description: Trust me, you don't want to go in there.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
Somethings wrong here...  Your boat is shaking back and forth.  You look
up to the sky as it darken.  There's a typhoon coming your way.  Turn
back, quickly, before that storm swallows you up!

Exits.Description: Trust me, you don't want to go in there.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: A powder room
rooms.Description:
No man, no warrior has ever dare to walk into this room!  Only
the King is allowed in here... As you walk inside this room you
notice that this is a powder room -- you can smell the perfume
all over the place.  There are mirrors on every wall.
Hmmm...You think to yourself, Gobi's not the type to put on 
lady's perfume -- who uses this room?

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

Exits.Description: If you value your life, stay away from there.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: Falling off the staircase
rooms.Description:
Ouch!  You fell right off the staircase.  You feel your bones 
shattered as you hit the solid stone floor.  You can feel the warm
blood coming out from your cracked skull as you cry out in pain.
If you're a strong warrior you may be able to survive this fall but
if you're not...then your journey ends here and now.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

Exits.Description: If you value your life, stay away from there.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: Gobi's room of terror
rooms.Description:
King Gobi, the lord of the living skeletal warriors, lives in
this room.  He sits on his mighty throne and laughs at you as you
walk into his room.  Gobi tells you, 'Little man-warrior, do you
have what it takes to defeat me?'  If you want to face the 
dreaded Gobi you will probably need assistance, not many warriors
can face this tyrant alone...  There's a door to the north of
where you're standing.

rooms.Name: Inside the Dark Castle
rooms.Description:
The insides of this castle is very well maintained.  There are
guards everywhere patrolling this castle.  You struggle to make
yourself unconspicuous...but these guards are just oo alert --
your presence has been detected.  Time to run...

rooms.Name: On the spiral staircase
rooms.Description:
Guards are everywhere!  There's nowhere to run.  As you climb
every step of this staircase you encounter a guard who's ready to
cut you up.  It's not easy trying to get to your destination.
Just as long as you keep advancing upwards the guards here will
diminish and there will be less resistance at the top.

Exits.Description: Warning: Falling off the staircase is bad for your health.
Warning: Falling off the staircase is bad for your health.

rooms.Name: On the old staircase
rooms.Description:
Watch Out!!!  There are guards everywhere in this castle.  They're 
here to protect their leader from invaders such as yourself.  You
are surrounded by troll soldiers.  They're about to attack you!

Exits.Description: Warning: Falling off a staircase is bad for your health.
Warning: Falling off the staircase is bad for your health.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

Exits.Description:
This whirlpool is an obvious deathtrap but something's different
about it...  You have chosen the wrong path that could have taken
you "around" this deathtrap.
If you value your life, stay away from there.

rooms.Name: The hallway of horror
rooms.Description:
You reached the second floor of this dreaded castle.  You may think
you're safe but there are troll guards here that patrol the area.  
As you turn your head you notice a large troll guard standing in 
front of you!  Behind this large, ugly troll is a bedroom door.

rooms.Name: On top of the staircase
rooms.Description:
This is it.  You've reached the top of this staircase.  However,
there are still guards here coming after you.  To your west, you
notice a door made of pure gold and studded with rare gems and 
emeralds.  You drool at the thought of what you can do with the
wealth that's probably locked behind that door.  But first, 
you'll have to kill off that damn guard that's blocking your way!

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

Exits.Description:
This whirlpool is an obvious deathtrap but something is different
about it...  There is another way to go "around" this
whirlpool if you do not wish to die.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

Exits.Description: If you value your life, stay away from there.

This whirlpool is an obvious deathtrap but there's something different
about it...  There is another way to get "around" it if you don't
want to enter here.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

Exits.Description: There's something fishy about this whirlpool...

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

Exits.Description: If you value your life, stay away from there.

rooms.Name: The room of the Troll Lord
rooms.Description:
You've entered the room of the bloodthirsty Troll Lord -- King of
all troll warriors!  The Troll Lord is not happy that you've entered
his room uninvited.  He begins strapping on his battle gear as 
though he is ready to do battle.  The Troll Lord growls at you as
he displays his large bloody battle-axe.

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to
yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

Exits.Description: If you value your life, stay away from there.

yourself if you`ll ever get back to shore.

out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to

Exits.Description:
This whirlpool is an obvious deathtrap but something is different
about it...  You are now choosing a path that can take you around
this deathtrap.

rooms.Description:
You are surrounded by water from all directions...  The only living things
out here are marine life.  As you sail on the Endless Sea, you wonder to

rooms.Name: a whirlpool
rooms.Description:
There's something unusual about this whirlpool...  It seems to be only
an illusion to fool outsiders.  There's an island to you east.  It looks
dark and covered in thick fog.  If you're thinking about going there
maybe you should think again...

rooms.Name: The vast expanse of the Endless Sea
rooms.Description:

Exits.Description: There's something fishy about this whirlpool...
